name: Formula Car Lifeless Tournament: Unleashed Race
name_original: Formula Car Lifeless Tournament: Unleashed Race
description:
Drive the fastest cars on the planet in ultimate racing game which will test your skills and determination to be the best racing driver on the world.
Finally, the Formula Car Lifeless Tournament: Deadly Lucid Race has landed on Apple Store It’s a highly addictive game for crazy fans of arcade racing and driving simulations.
Love driving cars? Gets the pleasure of racing your dream car with the most stunning interiors, featuring rear view mirrors and windscreen wipers.
Beautiful graphics with realistic scenarios will make the game an addictive one for all those who love to drive.
If you grew up loving racing games, then Extreme awaited Formula Car Speed Racer has landed on Apple Store. It’s a highly addictive game for crazy fans of arcade racing and driving simulations. Choose the favorite car of your own choice and embrace the challenge, Challenge to Win! Can you?
Amazing physics engine that can deliver the most realistic racing fun possible.
A new car racing experience for all the simulator fans!
You will be greatly impressed by the splendid scenes and easy control!
